titlealts.searchtitle: Attribute: MULTIDISCIPLINARY TEAM CANCER CARE PLAN DISCUSSED INDICATOR - Description

body.p: An indication of whether the PATIENT 's Cancer Care Plan was discussed at a Multidisciplinary Team Meeting .

For the National Cancer Waiting Times Monitoring Data Set , MULTIDISCIPLINARY TEAM CANCER CARE PLAN DISCUSSED INDICATOR will usually relate to a MULTIDISCIPLINARY TEAM DISCUSSION DATE (CANCER) that is before the commencement of treatment. However it is recognised that this is not possible in all clinical circumstances.
